title: There is no pixel imprint setting on my pixel 2 xl
content: Google where is the pixel imprint setting??what is the purpose of putting fingerprint reader on back if there is no option to set it up..i tried every trick to fix this issue.but nothing worked for me please tell me if there is any other way to ..fix that its 2019 and im still using phone with pin security .despite of having a fingerprint scanner..
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
